about_the_game:
The adventurer's finally reached the end -- is it a way back home, or place to start a new life?

The Adventurer's Final Journey Music Pack features 20 orchestrated tracks from D. C. Kairi Sawler that will round the series out as a whole! This Final Pack contains a ton of various music for all sorts of moods, and round out the the previous Three packs to make one amazing collection!

This pack contains:

  • 20 Orchestrated Tracks.
  • OGG, WAV, MP3 and M4A file formats
  • Royalty free sounds to use in your commercial and non-commercial game projects.

Tracklist:

Animystical
Blinking Away
Cheered Port
Chip off the Old Block
Dark Corners
Darker Still
Difficult Decisions
Florana's Battle
Florana's Fairy
Florana's Happy
Florana's Melancholy
Florana's Theme
Holy Remission
Pillar of Judgement
Regality
Running Downhill
Snow Trails
Sorrow's Cessation
Stepping Stones
Swift Dawn
The Secret of Trees
Training the Sun
Warm Heart
